name: Shada_Hsskhor
content: Shada Hsskhor was a male Trandoshan bounty hunter who competed to participated in the Great Hunt during the Cold War. Hsskhor was one of a dozen hunters who competed for the last spot in the Great Hunt, and during his pursuit of the three bounties he had been assigned, he was arrested in the jungles of Dromund Kaas. However, he still succeeded in acquiring his targets, and competed in the Grand Melee against several other huntersâ€”though he was slain in the fighting. He carried a pair of blaster pistols and wore black and gold armor.
